TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
A flying ostrich would cause an interest of police.

What if wrap T-800 with T-1000 instead of the human fake flesh?

The plot of number 3.

Was each a self cancelling prophecy?

Yes they were.

Did they use a Delorean to travel back in time?

After the futurepast had been changed, we do not exactly know what was the Delorean initially.

Was the hovering board today's electric scooter?

No, it was a product that was repulsed by everything it met.

How long to personal carbon fibre glide wings?
The time it takes you to make them

Yes, to answer your question. Everybody makes their own bespoke things, nobody buys things made by large companies.

Do you like shiny things?

Yes, they are so shy.

As lunacy is for Luna, does Jupiter have 60+ moonacies at once?

Edited June 23 by kerbiloid

Yes, yes it does.

Hey Ferb, what are we going to do today?

all of it

who let the dogs out?

Noone. They are autolet.

Why are the cats cleverer than the non-cats?

They aren't. Being lazy and cute just means that people cut them more slack.

Is the Forum here or not here?

It’s here if you can read this, and it isn’t if you can’t. 

Is plutonium edible?

Yes, up to 10..16 kg at once (depends on the crystal lattice phase). Then your seat goes boom.

Why is erbium more tasty than ytterbium?

Erbium is more tasty because you use it to make Iced VoVos and Candy Floss.

Have you tried "I can't believe it's not butter ytterbium"?

Ytterly often.

Are the butterflies from Ytterby ytterflies?

Yes, and they naturally toast to a golden brown over time.

Do you think they have active radios?

Yes, at least the Threedawgnight's one.

Is the Fallout 4 power armor at the very beginning an imba?

No, an imba is Kimba the White Lion, searching for their K.

If I could turn back time, would it fix anything?

It's not a matter of if, for you see, you can turn back time on any clock.  And no, it doesn't really fix anything.

I shot the sheriff...but who shot the deputy?
Are you the shot sheriff's shot deputy?

The Sheriff shot the Deputy who shot the Sheriff but I swear it was in self defence.

What was the name of the horse that you rode through the desert? You said it was good to get out of the rain.

Nameless

Can the world survive without the forum?
It can, but should it?

Hard to say.

What would we do?
